Html:
I'm just trying to fix an issue I'm experiencing on my side but latest commit available is commit cb992940d9ce, dic 23, 2012, that is quite useless now.

Is it possible to update source code and have a fresh commit?

Cheers

The reason why I installed WPP on my company WSUS (instead of other proprietary solutions) was it being "open source" and, since I'm a developer, I thought I could better "supervise" (and fix) it.

Actually source control missing, on such a critical software, is becoming too risky for me...
